about-me-content-1: Full Stack Developer with 3 years of experience in developing web and mobile applications. I focus on creating solutions that blend intuitive design with efficient functionality to ensure that each project not only meets its technical objectives but also delivers an exceptional user experience.
about-me-content-2: I specialize in technologies such as JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, and have solid experience with frameworks like React, Angular, Ionic, and Astro. Additionally, my technical and practical training in UX/UI Design allows me to approach digital product creation from a comprehensive, user-centered perspective.
about-me-content-3: I consider myself a creative person and very attentive to details, which helps me when thinking and designing.
reconnect-description: Responsive web section for plan subscription, designed in Figma and created with React and Tailwind.
notatky-description: Note taking web application where you can create a profile and save your notes, you can also filter them by tags, add them to collections and more.
meteor-description: UX case study of a fashion e-commerce based on inclusiveness, it's an app where you can buy all models and sizes products.
radley-description: Web prototype of a fashion e-commerce where you can view, search and buy products, it has categories and a shopping bag.
